title: Transfer of Title Deeds to Relocated families at Terrance Avenue, Dehiwala
decision_details: - Sri Lanka Land Reclamation and Development Corporation (SLLR&DC) has acquired approximately 6.5 acres of marshy land at Terrence Avenue, Dehiwala in 1989 and about 45 families who were scattered in this land at the time of acquisition were relocated in a part of the same land.  On a proposal made by H.E. the President, as Minister of Defence, Cabinet approval was granted to issue title deeds to these occupants.
